answers.answer: I got this pre-pregnancy and now during (sometimes) its dehydration for me. I just take down a bottle of water when it happens.
I'm at 39+3 and between my 4-6 month i was ALWAYS thirsty!  I would have rather drank something than eat. My doctor told me to just give my body what it wanted.  My gtt was just fine too...

question: Hi , I'm 24 weeks and Since a couple of weeks ago I've been feeling VERY thristy . Specially in the middle of the night and when I wake up . Is this normal ? I'm worried it can be gestational diabetes .
title: thirsty all the time. HELP.!
